description: Enjoy high-performance, stereo audio for PC calling, music, and games from up to 33 feet away from your computer.Overview Performance2.4 GHz wireless: Move freely up to 33 feet (10 meters) away from your computer.Laser-tuned audio drivers: Advanced laser design technology delivers high-quality, uncompressed, stereo audio.Noise-canceling microphone: Reduces background noise for clear conversations and voice commands.      ControlQuick-access audio controls: Adjust volume and microphone mute right on the headset.Flexible boom: Bend the boom for optimal microphone placement.Rotate-to-mute: Microphone automatically mutes when rotated up and out of the way.      ConvenienceSimple setup: Installation takes just seconds with the included USB wireless transmitter – no software or pairing required.Plush headband and ear pads: Enjoy exceptional comfort for hours on end.Microphone mute light: Microphone tip softly glows when muted.      VersatilityFor use with: PC games; movies; music; and common calling applications including Skype®, Yahoo!®, Windows Live™, and AIM®. System RequirementsPCWindows® 2000, Windows® XP, Windows Vista®USB portMacMac OS® X (10.2.8 or later)USB portTechnical SpecificationsFrequency responseHeadset: 20-20,000 HzMicrophone: 100-10,000 HzSensitivity:62 dBV/µBar42 dBV/PA +/-3 dBWireless Protocol: 2.4 GHzUSB compatible (1.1 and 2.0)Package ContentsLogitech® ClearChat PC Wireless™USB wireless transmitterWireless transmitter standAC chargerQuick-start guide2-year limited warranty
title: Logitech ClearChat Wireless USB Headset - Black
